title: Azure PowerShell Repository Reference
body: Azure PowerShell repository (Azure/azure-powershell) contains cmdlets and modules for Azure resource management. Includes authentication patterns, resource deployment scripts, automation examples, and Azure service integration. Critical for Azure infrastructure as code, automation, and PowerShell-based Azure management workflows.
